The Quranic researcher is your endeavor, meaning: your endeavors; The added source benefits the general, so it is a group of meaning, and therefore he told him about a group, which means the saying of the Almighty: I will not be a gathering.It is permissible that your endeavor is not considered in the sense of gathering, and it will be a feminine source of feminine as a remembrance and a tenderness that has been informed of it with added estimated estimation; That is: it is different or by its interpretation with description; That is, a scatter or by making it a way to be free.Whatever it was, the sentence is the answer to the division as the son of Jerir was brought up from Qatada, and it was permissible for the answer to be estimated as it was a time that it was time and what is meant by the time.
